title: Mea Nuu Vegetarian Food
description: Family-owned veggie restaurant located on Sukhumvit Road heading south towards Sattahip (opposite side of Makro) after Thepprasit Road between Caltex petro station and DECCO. Look for big yellow vegetarian sign. Free Wi-Fi access. Sells frozen soy veggie protein, TVP, noodles and other products for home cooking. Reported use of MSG in their cooking, please confirm and let HappyCow know.
